#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll M=1000000007;
int main()
{
    ll t;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {

       ll n,m,k;
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&n,&m,&k);

        ll p=m*k;
        ll s=0,a;
        for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
        {cin>>a;
        if(a>=p)
        s=(s%M+(a-p)%M)%M;
        else
        {
          ll j=a/k;
          s=(s%M+(a-(j*k))%M)%M;
        }
        }
        printf("%lld\n",s);

    }

}
